CustomField.description: Constructs a street value for usein Billing- or Shippingstreet
CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISBLANK(TEXT(Address__r.Country__c)), TEXT(Address__r.Country__c) = 'NL'), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Address__r.PO_Box_Number__c)), "Postbus "&Address__r.PO_Box_Number__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Address__r.Freepost_number__c)), "Antwoordnummer "&Address__r.Freepost_number__c, Address__r.Street__c&" "& Address__r.House_Number__c&" "&Address__r.House_Letter__c&" "&Address__r.House_Number_Addition__c ) ), TRIM(Address__r.Address_Line_1__c&" "&Address__r.Address_Line_2__c) )
CustomField.label: Full Street Name
